message: I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product for a price that I think is fair. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000.
Thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe we can reach a more agreeable price. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $850000.
I appreciate your counteroffer, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so I'll counteroffer with a price of $950000.
I understand your position, but I still believe we can find a mutually beneficial price. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $925000.
I'm still not willing to go that low, but I'm willing to compromise. I'll counteroffer with a price of $975000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I still feel there is room for negotiation. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $950000.
